channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: MrBeastは、この仰々しいYouTubeの時代をいかに支配し、高速で、必死で、どこにでもいるような編集スタイルを使い、彼の動画が徐々にストーリーテリングに重点を置くように進化していくのか（Patricia Hernandez/Polygon）
item.description:
Patricia Hernandez / Polygon:
How MrBeast dominates this ostentatious YouTube era, using a fast, frantic, and omnipresent editing style, as his videos slowly evolve to focus on storytelling  —  Jimmy Donaldson warped YouTube in his image — but YouTube is warping him back  —  In the fall of 2023, a clip ripped from a video …

item.title: 文芸誌『ゲルニカ』、イスラエル在住のリベラル派作家ジョアンナ・チェンによるパレスチナ人とのつながりに関する記事を撤回、12人以上のスタッフが抗議の辞任を表明（Jenny Jarvie/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Jenny Jarvie / Los Angeles Times:
Literary journal Guernica retracts an article by Israel-based liberal writer Joanna Chen on connecting with Palestinians, after 12+ staff resigned in protest  —  What are the limits of empathy in war?  —  That's the question that Joanna Chen, a liberal writer and translator who is Jewish …

item.title: 出願：NYTが著作権侵害の誤解を招く証拠を作るためにChatGPTを「ハッキング」したというOpenAIの主張を、NYTは「大見得を切った」と否定している（Blake Brittain/Reuters）
item.description:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
Filing: the NYT denies OpenAI's claims that the NYT “hacked” ChatGPT to create misleading evidence of copyright infringement, calling the claims “grandstanding”  —  The New York Times (NYT.N) has denied claims by OpenAI that it “hacked” the company's artificial intelligence systems …

item.title: スポティファイ、ブラジル、イタリア、英国など11の市場でモバイルおよびデスクトップアプリにミュージックビデオをベータ展開、プレミアム加入者が利用可能（Romain Dillet/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Romain Dillet / TechCrunch:
Spotify rolls out music videos to its mobile and desktop apps in beta in 11 markets, including Brazil, Italy, and the UK, available to Premium subscribers  —  Spotify is adding music videos to its mobile and desktop apps in some markets.  They are tightly integrated with the company's music library …

item.title: 過去12ヶ月間に、公文書公開を求めるジャーナリストや報道機関に160万ドル以上の弁護士報酬が支払われた。
item.description:
Stephanie Sugars / US Press Freedom Tracker:
A review shows $1.6M+ in attorneys' fees were awarded to journalists and outlets suing for public records access in the past 12 months; taxpayers paid the fees  —  Stephanie Sugars from Freedom of the Press Foundation  —  When officials wrongly keep constituents in the dark and journalists fight …

item.title: 米国著作権局とUSPTOによる調査では、NFTの著作権に関する懸念には既存の法律で十分対応可能であり、知的財産法を変更する必要はないと結論付けられている（Timmy Shen/The Block）。
item.description:
Timmy Shen / The Block:
A study by the US Copyright Office and USPTO concludes that existing laws are sufficient to address NFT copyright concerns and there's no need to change IP laws  —  - The intellectual property authorities in the U.S. noted in an NFT study that the current laws are sufficient to address infringement concerns.

item.title: 2024年のインド総選挙を前に、最近公開された、あるいは近々公開される少なくとも10のボリウッド映画は、BJPの政治的アジェンダを増幅している（Kunal Purohit/Al Jazeera）
item.description:
Kunal Purohit / Al Jazeera:
Ahead of India's 2024 general election, at least 10 Bollywood movies that have either been released recently or releasing soon amplify BJP's political agenda  —  Mumbai, India - A grimacing police official, staring into the camera, declares her intent to publicly shoot dead “leftists” …

item.title: UTA傘下メディアリンクのパートナー兼CEOマイケル・カッサン氏を資金流用の疑いでUTAが解雇・提訴、カッサン氏はメディアリンク買収をめぐりUTAを反訴（Matt Donnelly/Variety）
item.description:
Matt Donnelly / Variety:
UTA fires and sues Michael Kassan, partner and CEO of UTA-owned MediaLink, alleging misappropriation of funds; Kassan countersues UTA over MediaLink acquisition  —  Agency says executive was fired after “exhaustive investigation”  —  United Talent Agency has been accused of breach of contract …

item.title: 2022年1月に削除されたニール・ヤングは、「アップルとアマゾンが同じ偽情報を提供し始めた」として、スポティファイに楽曲を復活させる（Chris Eggertsen/Billboard）
item.description:
Chris Eggertsen / Billboard:
Neil Young is bringing back his music to Spotify, after the removal in January 2022, saying “Apple and Amazon have started serving the same disinformation”  —  Neil Young is bringing his music back to Spotify more than two years after requesting its removal from the platform …

item.title: キルギスの裁判所は8人のテミロフ・ライブ記者の拘留を延長し、2人を自宅軟禁、1人を釈放した。
item.description:
Metin Kazama / OCCRP:
A Kyrgyzstan court extends eight Temirov Live journalists' detention, puts two under house arrest, and frees one; all were charged with “inciting mass unrest”  —  A court in Kyrgyzstan on Tuesday extended the pre-trial detention of eight journalists who are charged with …

item.title: TikTok、マネタイズプログラム「Effect Creator Rewards」をアルゼンチン、ベルギー、イスラエルを含む33地域に拡大、支払い基準額を引き下げ（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
TikTok expands its Effect Creator Rewards monetization program to 33 more regions, including Argentina, Belgium, and Israel, and lowers its payout threshold  —  TikTok is expanding its Effect Creator Rewards monetization program to more regions and lowering its payout threshold, the company announced today.

item.title: El País、El HuffPost、1,200のラジオ局などを所有するプリサ・メディアは、ジャーナリストがスペイン語でディープフェイク・オーディオを識別するのに役立つVerificAudioを立ち上げた（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Prisa Media, owner of El País, El HuffPost, 1,200 radio stations, and more, launches VerificAudio, which helps journalists identify deepfake audio in Spanish  —  Journalists can now identify Spanish-language deepfake audio using a new tool called VerificAudio launched Tuesday, according to an announcement from Prisa Media.

item.title: SXSWでの講演：NYTのAIイニシアチブ担当編集ディレクター、ザック・スワードが、ジャーナリズムにおける機械学習とジェネレーティブAIのベスト＆ワーストの使い方をカタログ化する。
item.description:
Zach Seward:
SXSW talk: Zach Seward, NYT's editorial director of AI initiatives, catalogs some of journalism's best and worst uses of machine learning and generative AI  —  My talk at SXSW 2024  —  I just gave this talk at SXSW.  It was my first public presentation since starting my new job at The New York Times.

item.title: Tubiのレポート：調査対象者の62％が有料ストリーミングより広告付きストリーミングを好むと回答、Z世代とミレニアル世代の74％がリメイクよりオリジナルを好むと回答（Kayla Cobb/The Wrap）
item.description:
Kayla Cobb / The Wrap:
Tubi report: 62% of people surveyed said they prefer ad-supported streaming over paid, 74% of Gen Z and millennials said they prefer originals to remakes  —  Additionally, 71% of younger people say they want to see more content from independent and smaller creators

item.title: アイルランドは、経験豊富なクルー、多目的なロケ地、そして最高1億3400万ドルまで製作費の32％を返還請求できる税制優遇措置により、映画製作者を惹きつけている（Becky Lucas/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Becky Lucas / The Hollywood Reporter:
Ireland attracts film producers by offering experienced crews, versatile locations, and tax incentives letting producers claim back 32% of spending up to $134M  —  Whether it's last year's Oscar champ ‘The Banshees of Inisherin,’ the Apple TV+ hit ‘Bad Sisters’ or this year's Berlinale opener 'Small Things …
